feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 2:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: WSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High zero. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
